properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: The background color used to clear the canvas. See {@link ColorSource} for accepted color values.

properties.name: background
properties.type:
ColorSource
    /**
     * Transparency of the background color, value from `0` (fully transparent) to `1` (fully opaque).
     * This value determines whether the canvas is initialized with alpha transparency support.
     * Note: This cannot be changed after initialization. If set to `1`, the canvas will remain opaque,
     * even if a transparent background color is set later.
     * @default 1
     */
    backgroundAlpha?: number

properties.name: clearBeforeRender
properties.description: Whether to clear the canvas before new render passes.
